physical_examinations.relevant_findings: 3-month-old infant had a machinery murmur, severe left ventricular hypertrophy (LVH), moderate-to-severe subaortic stenosis. Peak pressure gradient was 70 mm Hg, mean pressure gradient was 45 mm Hg.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up echocardiogram showed moderate LVH, peak pressure gradient of 51 mm Hg, and mean pressure gradient of 32 mm Hg.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: 5-year-old girl had a heart murmur, moderate aortic stenosis, and moderate LVH. Peak pressure gradient was 90 mm Hg, mean pressure gradient was 55 mm Hg.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Postoperative echocardiography showed moderate aortic valvular stenosis and a peak pressure gradient of 72 mm Hg.
